heroSection.description: Launch Your Own Branded Telecom Business in Minutes,with our all-in-one Self-Managed Dashboard that offers the cheapest calling rates you'll find anywhere.

whoIsItFor.title: Who Is It For ? Who can use this ?
whoIsItFor.subtitle: Whether you're an IT professional, marketing agency, telecom consultant, or entrepreneur our platform offers you to:
whoIsItFor.feature1: Provide reliable business VOIP solutions to your clients
whoIsItFor.feature2: Serve SMBs, freelancers, and call centers with high-demand communication tools
whoIsItFor.feature3: Launch a scalable, recurring revenue stream under your own name

everythingYouNeedSection.description: Our reseller platform gives you everything needed to start, scale, and profit from your own branded communication service.

fastSetupSection.title: Fast Setup & Flexible Payments
fastSetupSection.subtitle: Start selling telecom services in 15 minutes.

noHardware.title: No hardware required
noHardware.description: works with softphones or existing desk phones

acceptPayments.title: Accept payments
acceptPayments.description: via Credit Card, Stripe, PayPal, or Crypto

whiteLabelSection.title: Complete White-Label Control

whiteLabelSection.footerNote: You focus on client relationships and growth. We provide the tech backbone.
